docpx\Doc¶

Doc

Doc represents a parsed PHP source document.

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct($file, $tokens)¶

Constructs a new Doc object.

Parameters:
  • $file (string) – PHP source file path
  • $tokens (object) – docpxTokens

parse¶

parse()

Parses the Doc tokens.

getNextNonWhitespace¶

getNextNonWhitespace()¶

Returns the next non-whitespace token found.

Return type:object docpxNode
